title: Embed
content:
I was just taking a look at Grant Hutchinson's website and saw a post about Monotype suing Tom Murphy over this "Embed" app that changes embedding restrictions on a font.   
   
Grant's Site:   
 [http://www.splorp.com/blog/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011103638/http:/www.splorp.com/blog/)   
   
Tom Murphy's rebuttal to Monotype:   
 [http://www.andrew.cmu.edu/~twm/embed/dmca.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011103638/http:/www.andrew.cmu.edu/~twm/embed/dmca.html)   
   
any comments on all of this?
author: kraftie

comments.content:
I haven't read all the material, but it's pretty clear that the main purpose of laws like the DMCA is to make the rich richer.   
   
hhp

Just to clarify: this doesn't mean stealing is OK. In fact, the DMCA itself is theft, and that's why I don't like it.   
   
hhp
